alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 11 at 5:29PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Additional heavy rainfall will impact portions of central Alachua County and the City of Gainesville through 700 PM EST... At 527 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm with heavy rainfall over Alachua, or 10 miles northwest of Gainesville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Minor to moderate flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Street and highway flooding due to heavy rainfall is likely. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Alachua, University Of Florida, Orange Heights, Gainesville Airport, Newnans Lake, Rochelle, Waldo and Grove Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
